game_description: Take your best shots in sequential 2nd, 3rd and Zigzag stages in the main game mode, prepared from a real Basketball Training thesis. In the Statistical Training mode, you shoot in 5 zones, in a certain zone order and at a distance. Depending on the time and the number of shots, you will see statistically how well you are in which part of the field and how many baskets you have made from which region. In this way, you will analyze in which region you need to improve yourself and how well you are in which region. In the Challenge game mode, you will freely fight against time on the field and experience the excitement with advanced sound and physics. If the difficulty options are, you will never be able to say that you are great in this game! Because the competitive score of each difficulty stage is kept separately, fight with your friends and prove yourself with realistic physics feeling!
Languages: English, Arabic, Dutch, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish
review_1: The game needs to be more user friendly. May need shot assist . And a tutorial.
